channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@koshersemite Mute or block might work.
@koshersemite The latter if you never want to see that tweeter again.
@lionel_trolling So: It could be worse for the Jews?
@DemocraticLuntz My zeide had a dreidel / They made it out of lead / and even though I love him / he’s soft inside his head

Sad to see kids smoking away their childhood, which should have been filled with toys. Like lead dreidels. https://t.co/YSwGi1KZHp
I first discovered lead dreidels when reading about the founding of the Ktav publishing house, which grew out of a Lower East Side lead dreidel business.
JTA recently wrote about Arthur Kurzweil’s dreidel collection. Some are pewter. https://t.co/KxYEZhUXD3
@sirachsingers DS9: Move Along Home.
@dzkalman Makes sense that he would share a wardrobe with the mascot that represents the essence of the Omer. https://t.co/gpsjhTto3q
@bernstein_judah I have seen no reports of any actual investigation of the chain of causality that leads to anti Asian hatred and from that bigotry to criminal attacks.
Your occasional reminder that my centrist Jewish congressman boasts of his corporate career at Ford. And he says I’m the antisemite. https://t.co/ZZW57XDTFG
@johnastoehr To be fair, we haven’t seen a major history-defining failure of an autocrat since the 2022 invasion of Ukraine.
@trekonomics Your occasional reminder that Dennis Prager’s American fascist propaganda outlet whitewashed the atrocities of Christopher Columbus.
@PlaytimeTati @froomkin @nytimes And don’t forget the Clinton Whitewater scandal. https://t.co/1DoT2Vr1MQ
@scottdagostino @rudepundit Wikipedia on this law which I just learned of thanks to you is excellent: https://t.co/qOT2P4R6NN
Today I learned about Brandolini’s law. https://t.co/q6QQnF19ce

@onthemainline One Seder I offered four explanations for the orange on our plate. One was a Zionist reference to Jaffa oranges. One was this historically accurate explanation. One drew on Tu b’shvat klipa ideas. Can’t remember the fourth at the moment. Maybe a glass of wine would help…
@byJudeDoyle Data point: There was an antisemitic attack on a local doctor’s office in my very Jewish town not long ago seemingly motivated by these conspiracy theories. https://t.co/JeRPmpfFkT
@brianbeutler @joshtpm And the Dems are wired for the DC press as it existed when they were high school nerds back in thr 70s.
@Atrios Certainly the publishers and advertisers.
